Learn Japanese online Author: Daijiro Yokota (visit https://daijiro-yokota.github.io/ to learn more) Updated: 2024-07-12 Preface This book contains notes for anyone learing Japanese online. This is a living document, which will get updated regularly. When you find typos or have clarifying questions, please email daijiroyokota81@gmail.com. Acknowledgments These notes would not be possible without the bookdown package and the many open-source R packages used throughout the text. We thank the developers of these packages for making this work possible. The structure of this book is strongly influenced by the bookdown text written by Yihui Xie.
